direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods configure a Safelist but with different sets of allowed tags.
Both methods configure a Safelist with a specific set of allowed tags, but 'basic' allows more tags.
Both methods configure a Safelist with a specific set of allowed tags, but 'basicWithImages' additionally allows image tags.
Both methods configure a Safelist with a specific set of allowed tags, but 'relaxed' allows a broader range of tags.
The 'simpleText' method internally calls 'addTags' to configure the allowed tags.
The 'simpleText' method indirectly relies on 'addAttributes' to configure attributes for allowed tags, though it does not directly call it.
The 'simpleText' method indirectly relies on 'addEnforcedAttribute' to enforce specific attributes for allowed tags, though it does not directly call it.
The 'simpleText' method indirectly relies on 'addProtocols' to configure allowed protocols for attributes, though it does not directly call it.
